Laboratory Services

Our laboratory provides accurate and reliable diagnostic tests to help doctors assess your overall health and detect medical conditions early. We are equipped with modern technology to ensure fast and precise results.

Available Laboratory Tests

  • Complete Blood Count (CBC)
  • Urinalysis and Fecalysis
  • Blood Chemistry Tests
  • Lipid Profile
  • Blood Sugar (FBS/RBS)
  • Pregnancy and Thyroid Tests
  • Hepatitis, HIV, and STD Screening
Reminder: Regular laboratory testing can help detect diseases early — even before symptoms appear — enabling better treatment outcomes.

Specialized Diagnostics

Our clinic also provides specialized diagnostic tests for hormonal evaluation, kidney and liver function, and electrolyte balance — all interpreted by licensed medical technologists and physicians.

Before Your Lab Test

- Fasting for 8–10 hours may be required for some tests (e.g., blood sugar, lipid profile).
- Stay hydrated unless instructed otherwise.
- Bring valid identification and previous test results for comparison.
